Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers are in general way less available than AI, which you can just search for instead of having to wait for a response, you can ask ai to reword something as many times as you’d like, but in general ai likes to make up things so is less trustworthy. Ai will never answer with I don’t know and will always say something even if it’s nonsense

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI is almost always positive whereas teachers may be more inclined to provide more blunt feedback

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI will never grade anything that I submit whereas teachers will, which is unfortunate because I would like an estimate of how I’m doing on a particular assignment
